description: This file defines a Python dataclass 'xAI' that extends 'OpenAILike' for interacting with the xAI API, including attributes for API configuration and environment variable integration.

classes.name: xAI
classes.description: A class for interacting with the xAI API, extending OpenAILike, with attributes for API identification, provider, API key, and base URL.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Default constructor for the xAI dataclass, initializing API attributes with default values and environment variable for api_key.
